caseTitle: Dr. Yasmeen Jaffar v. Dr. Shehla Sami & others
tagline: The Service Tribunal examined Proforma Promotion Policy, 2011 which spelt out the criteria for grant of proforma promotion to Civil Servants and came to the conclusion that the petitioner did not meet any of the criteria provided in the Proforma Promotion Policy for entitlement to proforma promotion. The Tribunal had valid reasons and lawful justification to set aside the notification through which the petitioner was granted proforma promotion w.e.f. 22.01.2008 as Assistant Professor (BS-18).
